member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MemoryBlock
member.summary: Represents a block in memory.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MemoryReader
member.summary: Reads data from a memory block. Maintains a position.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MemoryReader.ReadAscii(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads zero terminated sequence of bytes of given maximal length and converts it into an ASCII string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MetadataName
member.summary: Zero terminated, UTF8 encoded sequence of bytes representing a name in metadata (a type name, a member name, etc). The name is bound to the module it was retrieved from. The module is kept alive until all its metadata names are collected. Doesn't cache hashcode, byte or character count.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MetadataTables.Module
member.summary: Gets the module whose metadata tables this instance represents. Null if the tables reflect unloaded module file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MetadataTables.Path
member.summary: Gets the path of the module whose metadata tables this instance represents. Null for in-memory modules that are not backed by a file.
member.exception: The path is not accessible in partial trust.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MetadataTables.AssemblyDef
member.summary: Returns AssemblyDef for manifest modules, null token otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MetadataRecord.IsValid
member.summary: Token is null or represents a row in a metadata table.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MetadataTableView.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of records in the view. If the view is over an entire table this operation is O(1), otherwise it might take up to O(log(#records in the table)).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.ModuleDef
member.summary: Module table entry (0x00 tokens).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeRef
member.summary: TypeRef table entry (0x01 tokens).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeRef.ResolutionScope
member.summary: AssemblyRef: If the target type is defined in a different Assembly from the current module. TypeRef: Target type is nested in TypeRef. ModuleRef: Target type is defined in another module within the same Assembly as this one. ModuleDef: If the target type is defined in the current module (this should not occur in a CLI "compressed metadata" module). Null token: There shall be a row in the ExportedType table for this Type - its Implementation field shall contain a File token or an AssemblyRef token that says where the type is defined.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeDef
member.summary: TypeDef table entry (0x02 tokens).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeDef.FindDeclaringType
member.summary: Finds a nesting type-def. The search time is logarithmic in the number of nested types defined in the owning module. Returns a null token if this is not a nested type-def.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeDef.GetGenericParameterCount
member.summary: O(log(#generic parameters in module))

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeDef.Attributes
member.summary: Flags field in TypeDef table.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeDef.IsGlobal
member.summary: This typedef represents a container of global functions and fields (manufactured <Module> type).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.FieldDef
member.summary: Combines Field (0x04 tokens), FieldRVA (0x1d tokens) and Constant (0x0B) table entries.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.FieldDef.GetDefaultValue
member.summary: O(log(#fields, parameters and properties with default value)). Returns if the field doesn't have a default value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.FieldDef.GetData(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns null reference iff the field has no RVA. If size is 0 the memory block will span over the rest of the data section. O(log(#fields with RVAs)).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.FieldDef.FindDeclaringType
member.summary: Finds type-def that declares this field. The search time is logarithmic in the number of types defined in the owning module.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.FieldDef.Attributes
member.summary: Flags field in the Field table.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodDef
member.summary: MethodDef table entry (0x06 tokens).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodDef.GetBody
member.summary: Returns a null reference iff the method has no body. If size is 0 the memory block will span over the rest of the data section.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodDef.FindDeclaringType
member.summary: Finds type-def that declares this method. The search time is logarithmic in the number of types defined in the owning module.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodDef.GetGenericParameterCount
member.summary: O(log(#generic parameters in module))

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodDef.ImplAttributes
member.summary: ImplFlags field in the MethodDef table.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodDef.Attributes
member.summary: Flags field in the MethodDef table.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.ParamDef
member.summary: Param table entry (0x08 tokens).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.ParamDef.GetDefaultValue
member.summary: O(log(#fields, parameters and properties with default value)). Returns if the field doesn't have a default value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.ParamDef.FindDeclaringMethod
member.summary: Binary searches MethodDef table for a method that declares this parameter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.ParamDef.Index
member.summary: Value greater or equal to zero and less than or equal to the number of parameters in owner method. A value of 0 refers to the owner method's return type; its parameters are then numbered from 1 onwards. Not all parameters need to have a corresponding ParamDef entry.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.InterfaceImpl
member.summary: InterfaceImpl table entry (0x09 tokens). TODO: we might not need this - TypeDef.ImplementedInterfaces might be a special enumerator that directly returns InterfaceType tokens.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.InterfaceImpl.ImplementingType
member.summary: Could be a null token in EnC scenarios.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.InterfaceImpl.InterfaceType
member.summary: TypeDef, TypeRef, or TypeSpec.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MemberRef
member.summary: MemberRef table entry (0x0A tokens). Stores MethodRefs and FieldRefs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MemberRef.Class
member.summary: TypeRef or TypeDef: If the class that defines the member is defined in another module. Note that it is unusual, but valid, to use a TypeRef token when the member is defined in this same module, in which case, its TypeDef token can be used instead. ModuleRef: If the member is defined, in another module of the same assembly, as a global function or variable. MethodDef: When used to supply a call-site signature for a vararg method that is defined in this module. The Name shall match the Name in the corresponding MethodDef row. The Signature shall match the Signature in the target method definition TypeSpec: If the member is a member of a generic type

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.CustomAttributeDef
member.summary: CustomAttribute table entry (0x0C tokens).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.CustomAttributeDef.Parent
member.summary: Any token except the CustomAttribute.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.CustomAttributeDef.Constructor
member.summary: Returns the value of Type column in the CustomAttribute table. MethodDef or MemberRef.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.CustomAttributeDef.Value
member.summary: Value blob.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.SignatureDef
member.summary: StandAloneSig table entry (0x11 token).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.PropertyDef
member.summary: Combines information from PropertyMap (0x15), MethodSemantics (0x18) and Property (0x17) tables.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.PropertyDef.GetDefaultValue
member.summary: O(log(#fields, parameters and properties with default value)). Returns if the field doesn't have a default value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.PropertyDef.FindDeclaringType
member.summary: Finds type-def that declares this property. The search time is logarithmic in the number of types with properties defined in the owning module.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.EventDef
member.summary: Combines information from EventMap (0x15), MethodSemantics (0x18) and Event (0x17) tables.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.EventDef.FindDeclaringType
member.summary: Finds type-def that declares this event. The search time is logarithmic in the number of types with events defined in the owning module.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.ModuleRef
member.summary: ModuleRef table entry (0x1A tokens).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeSpec
member.summary: TypeSpec table entry (0x1B tokens).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.AssemblyDef
member.summary: Assembly table entry (0x20 tokens).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.AssemblyRef
member.summary: Assembly table entry (0x23 tokens).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.FileDef
member.summary: File table entry (0x26 tokens).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeExport
member.summary: ExportedType table entry (0x27 tokens).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeExport.Implementation
member.summary: Forwarded type: AssemblyRef Nested types: ExportedType Type in another module of this assembly: FileDef

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.ManifestResourceDef
member.summary: ManifestResource table entry (0x28 tokens).

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.TypeNesting
member.summary: NestedClass table entry (0x29 tokens). TODO: Don't need if we exposed nested types enumeration on type-def directly and build TypeNesting mapping lazily.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.GenericParamDef
member.summary: GenericParam table entry (0x2A tokens).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.GenericParamDef.Index
member.summary: Value greater or equal to zero and less than or equal to the number of parameters in owner method/type. All generic parameters are listed in the table.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.GenericParamDef.Owner
member.summary: TypeDef or MethodDef.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.GenericParamConstraint
member.summary: GenericParamConstraint table entry (0x2C tokens).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.GenericParamConstraint.Constraint
member.summary: TypeDef, TypeRef, or TypeSpec.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodSpec
member.summary: MethodSpec table entry (0x2B tokens). Used when decoding IL instructions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MethodSpec.GenericMethod
member.summary: MethodDef or MethodRef.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Scripting.Metadata.MetadataToken.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: We need to be able to construct tokens out of byte-code.
